author: sebawagner
msg: OPENMEETINGS-460 Re-factor the converters to write to an object with defined attributes instead of a Map. The Map makes it somehow hard to understand which attributes will be really written to the result list of the converter (and we need to sync the result of the conversion process from the master to the slave via SOAP/REST and Axis2 does not support sending Map values, so we will use only summarizing object)
